title: BUSINESS EDUCATION
utme_requirements:
SSC credit passes or TC II merits in English Language and any three (3) of:

1. Economics

2. Accounts

3. Government

4. Geography

5. History

6. Business Method

7. Statistics

8. Commerce

9. Any Science subjects

 

NB: GROUP A:

Commercial Arithmetic Costing, Principles of Accounts, Book Keeping Mathematics, Statistics.

 

GROUP B:

Office Practice, Business Method, Commerce, Economics.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any of Geography, Commerce and Principles of Accounts.

title: COMPUTER EDUCATION/BIOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Biology/Integrated Science and any other Science subject.
subjects: Biology and any two (2) of Chemistry, Mathematics and Physics

title: COMPUTER EDUCATION/CHEMISTRY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics and any other Science subject.
subjects: Mathematics, Chemistry/Physics and any other Science subject

title: COMPUTER EDUCATION/PHYSICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any other two (2) Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and any other Science subject.

title: ENGLISH/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics, Literature in English and any other Arts/Social Science subject.
subjects: Economics, Literature in English and any other subject.

title: ENGLISH/FRENCH
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, French, Literature in English and any other Arts subjects.

title: ENGLISH/POLITICAL SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English, Government/History and any other Arts/Social Science subject.

title: ENGLISH/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English and any two (2) of Economics, Government/History, Geography/Social Studies.
subjects: Literature in English and any of Arts/Social Science subjects.

title: FRENCH/YORUBA
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes   in English Language, Mathematics, French, Yoruba and any other Arts subjects.
subjects: French, Yoruba and any other Arts subjects.

title: MATHEMATICS/BIOLOGY

subjects: Mathematics, Biology and any other Science subject.

title: MATHEMATICS/COMPUTER EDUCATION
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any other two (2) Science subjects.

title: MATHEMATICS/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two (2) Social Science subject.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and any other Social Science/Science subject.

title: PRIMARY EDUCATION STUDIES (DOUBLE MAJOR)
subjects: English Language and any other three (3) subjects.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Government/History and two (2) Social Science subjects.
subjects: Government/History and two (2) of Social Science subjects.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics, Government/History and any other Social Science subject.
subjects: Economics, History/Government and any other Social Science subject.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES/POLITICAL SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Government/History and two (2) Science subjects.

title: YORUBA / SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Government/History, Yoruba, one (1)   Arts/Social Science subject.
